summary: This document is an email chain from July 2020 regarding the FBI Victim Services Division's efforts to verify victim information and draft notification language for victims of Jeffrey Epstein's crimes. It discusses cross-referencing victim lists and includes approved language for victim notifications.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose crimes the victims are associated with; the original case is referenced.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division is actively working on verifying a comprehensive list of victims from the original Jeffrey Epstein case.
Approved language for victim notifications has been coordinated with FBI NY, VSD executive management, and the Office of General Counsel.
Victims are informed that they retain rights to services and support regardless of the focus of any specific indictment.
The communication highlights internal FBI processes for victim outreach and data accuracy in mid-2020.
